function hsm(){
        if(curSubMenu=="") return;
        else
        if (brwsVer>=4) {
                if (document.all) {
                        eval('document.all.'+curSubMenu).style.visibility='hidden';
                } else {
                        eval('document.'+curSubMenu).visibility='hide';
                }
                curSubMenu='';
        }
}
var brwsVer=parseInt(navigator.appVersion)
